page.title: 11Leisure
page.content: A survey in our school showed that all children had some special leisure time interest. The local areas of sport in Gillingham are places like the Black Lion Sports Centre and the Ice Rink. In my spare time I often go to the Strand swimming pool. I usually meet someone down there so it is very enjoyable it is also very cheap for only 30p. The crazy golf course is quite popular with me. Gillingham has quite a lot of places for leisure and some of them are beautiful like the B.M.X. park, which used to be a skateboard park but now bikes do stunts there and the stunts which they do are dangerous. Children mostly go to clubs like brownies and cubs which they find very interesting..
